alfredsnippet.snippet: For latest institution updates feel free to reference our Status Dashboard. With regards to Capital One, there is no way for any of our clients to prevent their users from connecting their account with Link, but an idea to inform your users about Capital One issues would be to build in a custom UI message based on onSuccess() or onExit() returning ins_9 in the callback response metadata (ref: docs).
alfredsnippet.name: onExit()
